name: Mom Spider Path
description:
This game was made in ~3 days for the WOWIE! JAM 3.0 Hosted by Jonas Tyroller

A mom spider who needs to get to her children BUT she can't walk on walls and she has to find a way and if she falls she will die.

Note: This is a rage game...

Keys: W A S D    -------------    Scroll to zoom

Assests used: PolygonCity and Power IK from Unreal marketplace
